name: Element 8
description: Element 8 is an integrated communications agency with extensive experience and track record that ensures your brand connects meaningfully with your customers. Armed with creative intelligence, original thinking and visionary ideas, they help in transforming brands, businesses and reputations. Their approach looks beyond immediate business needs to frame your project as an ongoing extension of your Brand's core promise.

locations.address: Office 3006, 30th Floor, Saeed Tower 1 Sheikh Zayed Road
